## VMMouse.down() method

Sends a low-level mousedown event to the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
down(options?: {
        button?: "left" | "middle" | "right" | undefined;
        clickCount?: number | undefined;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { button?: "left" \| "middle" \| "right" \| undefined; clickCount?: number \| undefined; } | <code>button</code>: mouse button to use, defaults to <code>&quot;left&quot;</code> <code>clickCount</code>: ignored |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
